summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Torre Lapillo Guest Portal iteration 2. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend core functionality working well with minor issues in navigation and background images.

ui_bugs.issue: Background image not displaying properly on accommodation card
Beach detail page navigation not working correctly from beaches list

passed_tests: All 30 backend API endpoints working (100% success)
Supermarket page with gallery, description, hours, services
Troubleshooting page with accordion and ticket form
Dashboard with weather widget and quick actions
Accommodation page with Wi-Fi, check-in/out info
All booking forms working (beach, restaurant, experience, rental)
Beaches with parking_info, best_time, tips, has_sunbeds
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Fix accommodation card background image display issue. 2. Fix beach detail page navigation from beaches list. 3. Ensure all beach detail pages have proper data-testid attributes. 4. Test and verify all booking forms are working end-to-end.
